subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After finishing third in the season points race last year as a rookie, Denny Hamlin could be forgiven if he was not feeling good about his position in this year’s Chase for the Nextel Cup.
snippet: After finishing third in the season points race last year as a rookie, Denny Hamlin could be forgiven if he was not feeling good about his position in this year’s Chase for the Nextel Cup.
